data.title: Free Download the best MediaCoder for Mac Alternative
data.meta_description: Still can't find MediaCoder for Mac? This passage will show you a free and powerful MediaCoder Mac and Windows Alternative.
data.text:
Overview

"Does MediaCoder work for Mac OS X El Capitan?

I can't find Media Coder for Mac OS X Yosemite. If MediaCoder doesn't work for Mac, then is there a MediaCoder alternative that is compatible with Mac computer?"

The above is a question raised by a MediaCoder user on the internet, which is a common issue bothering more and more MediaCoder users.

MediaCoder is one of the most popular video converters, released in 2005 by Microsoft Windows, supporting formats like MP3, MP4, WMA, WAV, AVI, AVC, DVD, Vorbis, etc. However, the biggest problem of MediaCoder is that it has no Mac version, in other words, Mac users will find MediaCoder doesn't work on their computer.

MediaCoder Mac

To solve the problem, one easy solution is to find MediaCoder for Mac Alternative. iDealshare VideoGo is your best option. Created to transcode and convert between almost all kinds of audio and video formats, this MediaCoder alternative for Mac and Windows is also efficient and user-friendly.

More Features about MediaCoder Mac

Video converter - convert between all kinds of video formats like MP4, AVI, MOV, MPEG, RMVB, WMV, MKV, WebM, SWF, FLV, OGV, VOB, ProRes, TS, DV, AVCHD, 3GP, DAV, DVR, WTV, R3D, MXF, XAVC etc.

Audio converter - convert between almost all the audio formats like FLAC, APE, DTS, WAV, AIFF, AU, RA, QCP, CAF, AMR, MP3, WMA, AAC, M4A, OGG, etc.

Video editor - Edit video like trim or crop, merge or split video or audio files, compress audio or video file to a smaller size, add or delete subtitle, or edit subtitle, subtract audio from video file, increase or decrease video or audio volume, add watermark, rotate video files etc.

MediaCoder Windows alternative version can work on Windows 10, 8, 7, XP, Vista; MediaCoder Mac altenative version can work on El Capitan, Yosemite, Mavericks, Mountain Lion, Lion and Snow Leopard.
